entry.title: WIND WARNING , New Glasgow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:13 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Caribou Point 02:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: NW 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain showers at times heavy changing to snow after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 along parts of the coast. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
